MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank, affecting properties in Dumbarton road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 02.19am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the fault and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:25am on Wednesday, 10 February 2021
